This component is created to show a basic mathematical question.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| `max`    | `max`     |             | `number` | `10`    |
| `min`    | `min`     |             | `number` | `1`     |
| `type`   | `type`    |             | `string` | `'ADD'` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                 | Description                                                                                                 |
| -------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--background-color` | Background color of the component, used as border color between numbers and symbols. Default is set to grey |
| `--box-shadow`       | Add shadow behind the container                                                                             |
| `--display`          | Tested using - grid and inline-grid only. Defaults to inline-grid                                           |
| `--div-background`   | Background color of the items inside the container. These are the cells which hold the numbers and symbol   |
| `--div-padding`      | Padding inside cell's                                                                                       |
| `--div-text-align`   | Text alignment of the numbers and symbol                                                                    |
| `--div-text-color`   | Text color inside cells                                                                                     |
| `--grid-gap`         | Gap between grid items                                                                                      |
| `--min-width`        | Min Width of the component, default is set to 200px. This will have no effect if --display is set to grid   |
| `--number-size`      | Font size for numbers                                                                                       |
| `--result-size`      | Font size for the result                                                                                    |
| `--symbol-size`      | Font size for the symbol                                                                                    |
